argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | oppcmon.o | |- O = ( oppCat ` C ) |
| 2 |  | oppcmon.c | |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) |
| 3 |  | oppcepi.e | |- E = ( Epi ` O ) |
| 4 |  | oppcepi.m | |- M = ( Mono ` C ) |
| 5 | 1 | #P_2oppchomf | |- ( Homf ` C ) = ( Homf ` ( oppCat ` O ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> ( Homf ` C ) = ( Homf ` ( oppCat ` O ) ) ) |
| 7 | 1 | #P_2oppccomf | |- ( comf ` C ) = ( comf ` ( oppCat ` O ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> ( comf ` C ) = ( comf ` ( oppCat ` O ) ) ) |
| 9 | 1 | #P_oppccat | |- ( C e. Cat -> O e. Cat ) |
| 10 | 2, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> O e. Cat ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( oppCat ` O ) = ( oppCat ` O ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_oppccat | |- ( O e. Cat -> ( oppCat ` O ) e. Cat ) |
| 13 | 10, 12 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( oppCat ` O ) e. Cat ) |
| 14 | 6, 8, 2, 13 | #P_monpropd | |- ( ph -> ( Mono ` C ) = ( Mono ` ( oppCat ` O ) ) ) |
| 15 | 4, 14 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( ph -> M = ( Mono ` ( oppCat ` O ) ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_oveqd | |- ( ph -> ( Y M X ) = ( Y ( Mono ` ( oppCat ` O ) ) X ) ) |
| 17 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Mono ` ( oppCat ` O ) ) = ( Mono ` ( oppCat ` O ) ) |
| 18 | 11, 10, 17, 3 | #P_oppcmon | |- ( ph -> ( Y ( Mono ` ( oppCat ` O ) ) X ) = ( X E Y ) ) |
| 19 | 16, 18 | #P_eqtr2d | |- ( ph -> ( X E Y ) = ( Y M X ) ) |
